column6: WILD KINGDOM Part 2 Investigating a the appearance of mutated wild animals in Africa, the X-Men come face to face with mutant bio-organisms the likes of which the world has never seen.  The key to defeating them may lie with the Black Panther.
column8: | penciller (cover):Frank Cho | letterer:Randy Gentile | writer:Reginald Hudlin | inker:Jay Leisten | colorist:Dean White | penciller:David Yardin
